title: Percentage type from GitHub
metric_query: select e.error / t.total * 100 as result from (select count(*) as total, 1 as temp from {var__trp_table} WHERE {CORE_FILTERS} and {TRP_FILTERS}) as t left outer join (select count(*) as error, 1 as temp from {var__trp_table} WHERE {CORE_FILTERS} and {TRP_FILTERS} and {var__column} = {var__a_number}) as e on e.temp = t.temp;
group_by_1_query: select {var__group_by_1}, e.error / t.total * 100 as error_rate from (select {var__group_by_1}, count(*) as total from {var__trp_table} WHERE {CORE_FILTERS} and {TRP_FILTERS} group by {var__group_by_1}) as t left outer join (select {var__group_by_1}, count(*) as error from {var__trp_table} WHERE {CORE_FILTERS} and {TRP_FILTERS} and {var__column}={var__a_number} group by {var__group_by_1}) as e on e.{var__group_by_1} = t.{var__group_by_1} order by error_rate desc;
group_by_2_query: select {var__group_by_1},{var__group_by_2}, e.error / t.total * 100 as error_rate from (select {var__group_by_1}, {var__group_by_2}, count(*) as total from {var__trp_table} WHERE {CORE_FILTERS} and {TRP_FILTERS} group by {var__group_by_1}, {var__group_by_2}) as t left outer join (select {var__group_by_1}, {var__group_by_2}, count(*) as error from {var__trp_table} WHERE {CORE_FILTERS} and {TRP_FILTERS} and {var__column}={var__a_number} group by {var__group_by_1}, {var__group_by_2}) as e on e.{var__group_by_1} = t.{var__group_by_1} ORDER BY {var__order_by} desc;
